title: Wide Tooth Comb,Carbon Fiber Hair Comb 100% Anti static 230℃ Heat Resistant Round Teeth Bristle Salon Combs for Blowing Dry Smoothing All Hair Types,Remove Knots (Paddle Brush R93201B-new)
features: ❶【WIDE SPACING AND SMOOTH ROUND TEETH DESIGNED FOR SCALP MASSAGE PROTECT HAIR FROM DAMAGE AND LOSS】Designed with arranged evenly,neatly and firm PP bristles. A wide spacing,Smooth rounded teeth prevent your scalp from being scratched ideal for blowing dry hair, creating a smooth finish before styling.Help you easily and painlessly detangle toughest tangles for dry/wet hair.Make sure your hair is fully tamed.

❷【GOOD HEAT RESISTANCE AND STRESS CRACK RESISTANCE & ERGONOMICS ROUND HANDLE】Heat and stress crack resistance PP material ensure it is durable and long-time life.Comfortable hand-grip, frosting humanized design that provides maximum control for a smooth finish.Helps build body while blow-drying without slipping.Lightweight for easy styling. It will let you fall in love with regular combing. Perfect size for keeping in your back pocket.

❸【USING EFFECT】Ideal for scalp massage to prevent sebum accumulation,stimulates blood flow.healthy nutrients to the hair follicles No matter you have curly, straight, fine, extra long, thin, wet, dry or damaged hair, it Will make your hair strong, healthy, soft, shiny and lush.

❹【HOW TO USE】 Place the wide tooth comb in the section, a few centimeters away from the root.Gentle to push the brush down the hair against the direction of growth, Daily use to build a shinier, softer and healthier hair ( 2 or 3 times a day).you will see less and less hairs left on the brush or floor.

❺【EASY TO CLEAN AND MAINTENANCE】 Use the hair comb cleaner to tick out the embed hair. Wash the wide tooth comb directly with water or shampoo. Then dry it up or Let it dry on its own.Avoid direct sunlight or dropping directly from high place.Come with a darling felt sleeve pouch for storage.
description: Refreshing yourself from a comb scalp massage to start a new day！Come back to do a comb massage to ease the fatigue of the day before your sleeping.
